    • Class aoop.asteroids.model.game.Bullet extends GameObject implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • stepsLeft

          int stepsLeft
          The amount of steps this bullet still is allowed to live. When this value drops below 0, the bullet is removed from the game model.

    • Class aoop.asteroids.model.game.Game extends java.util.Observable implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

          All the ships allwoed in the game.

        • bullets

          List of bullets.

          List of asteroids.

        • cycleCounter

          int cycleCounter
          Game tick counter for spawning random asteroids.

        • asteroidsLimit

          int asteroidsLimit
          Asteroid limit.

        • single

          boolean single
          Signle palyer variable.

        • morethan2playes

          boolean morethan2playes
          This boolean is to make sure when it is multiplaying mode, when there is one player left. The player would not be able to restart the game.

        • aborted

          boolean aborted
          Indicates whether the a new game is about to be started.
          See Also:
          Game.run()

          Holds true if object collided with another object, false otherwise.

        • stepsTilCollide

          int stepsTilCollide
          Counts the amount of game ticks left, until this object is allowed to collide.

          Direction the spaceship is pointed in.

          Score of the player. I.e. amount of destroyed asteroids.

          Indicates whether the fire button is pressed.
